attributes.action: That the Jobcentre in Penarth remains open to continue to serve the local community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the future of Penarth Jobcentre hangs in the balance.  Penarth Jobcentre has served the local community, those who are unemployed, sick or disabled, older and younger people.  We demand that this local service remains to continue to provide service to those who need it.  And that it offers a full range of Jobcentre plus services

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "That the Jobcentre in Penarth remains open to continue to serve the local community."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18632


Prime Minister's Office
